Description: Monthly Financial Close Service Level Agreement
Scope: 7 working day close cycle with defined deliverables per phase
Notes: SLA includes penalties for delays beyond WD7

Scope: BUs to submit accrual support by WD2 of each period

Notes: Audit fee accrual based on quarterly milestones

Scope: Monthly payroll processing and statutory compliance filings
Notes: Includes final pay and 13th month processing

Scope: All team members to submit weekly timesheets by Monday 12nn

Description: System Uptime SLA for Finance Applications
Scope: 99.5% uptime for ERP and finance systems during business hours
Management fees and cost allocations across APAC entities
